title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – Gruden and Mayock; Quinnen Williams vs.Nick Bosa; Middlekauff Mailbag
itunes:title: Middlekauff – 3 & Out – Gruden and Mayock; Quinnen Williams vs.Nick Bosa; Middlekauff Mailbag
description:
Subscribe here to the 3 and Out with John Middlekauff Podcast https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/3-and-out-with-john-middlekauff/id1352730623?mt=2. 

In this episode, Middlekauff looks at Jon Gruden and GM Mike Mayock's relationship as they head into their first draft together, of Gruden will listen to him, if the Niners should pick Ohio State's Nick Bosa or Alabama's Quinnen Williams, and answers listener questions in Middlekauff's Mailbag. Follow John on twitter @JohnMiddlekauff and go to www.theherdnow.com to find the latest content. Subscribe now!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
